title: So...... Wild + Assassin?
body:
I have a question regarding the new Wild buff in conjunction with Assassin.

How would Wild's (4) Basic attacks cannot miss mod interact with Assassin Crits vs {{item:3046}} 

Which stat pre-empts the other, since both are written in absolutism?

Needless to say...... Assassin + Wild is going to be a Yordle killer.

replies.body:
Yup 4 Wild w/ an Assassin stack (Rengar probably) seems nuts.

If you can manage to get a Youmuu or FoN you can get 4 Wild 6 Assassin at level 8.
Things that say "can not be dodged" take priority over things saying they dodge.  Wild (4) wins against {{item:3046}} and {{champion:98}} and yordles.
